text: @HillaryClinton Trumpers LOVE to bring up Benghazi, 4 dead Americans, yet don't seem to care there are 128K dead due to Trump's ignorance & laziness on Covid nor seem to care he allowed Russia to put out bounties for American soldiers. The hypocrisy is literally mind-blowing.
